Lee Sin
the Blind Monk

Lee sin is a really strong character that makes flashy plays. There are very few League of legends pros that can play this champ to the maximum potentional. Imaqtpie is a revolutionary Leesinger god. rush

Forms of Lee sin

Muay Thai

Lee sin

Pool Party

Lee sin

Knock Out

Lee sin

God Fist

Lee sin

more forms >

Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike

Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it hits. if a enemy is hit he can use Resonating strike which dashes to the enemy

Safeguard / Iron Will

Lee sin dashes to a target alley and shielding himself from damage and if the target alley is a champion they also get shielded. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp if casted again.

Tempest / Cripple

Lee sin smashes the ground, sending out shockwaves that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units that were hit. if recasted reduces enemy movement speed for 4 secs and movement speed gradually restores.

Dragon's Rage

Lee sin performs a round house kick which sends his target flying back and deals damage to the target and any enemies who collide. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring.
